scripts.clean: rm -rf dist app/index.html app/media/js/bundle.js app/media/js/bundle.js.map app/media/css/bundle.css app/media/css/bundle.css.map
scripts.watch: npm run clean && parallelshell 'npm run watch:lint' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:css' 'browser-sync start -c browser-sync.config.js'
scripts.watch:js: watchify app/media/js/main.js -vd -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --ignore app/media/js/vendors/** ] -t brfs -o app/media/js/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build:lint && npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:uglify && npm run build:html && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: browserify app/media/js/main.js -d -t browserify-shim -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --ignore app/media/js/vendors/** ] -t brfs -t [ uglifyify -x .js ] | exorcist app/media/js/bundle.js.map > app/media/js/bundle.js
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs -cm --in-source-map app/media/js/bundle.js.map --source-map app/media/js/bundle.js.map --source-map-url bundle.js.map -o app/media/js/bundle.js app/media/js/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rsync -rl --exclude-from=rsyncignore app/ dist
